name: 2nd Circle - Powerful Magic
description: You are a New Wizard. You have the Exciting Power to Cast Spells. Imagine Cloaking Yourself in Fire, so Nobody can Touch You. Or Summoning a Bee-Swarm, that Attacks Anybody in Your Way.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 8 Процессор: +2 Ghz Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Yes DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 750 MB Звуковая карта: Yes
